title: AI Fears Hinder Deutsche Bank’s $1.2 Billion Loan Deal for Conga
description: A group of lenders led by Deutsche Bank AG is at risk of getting stuck with about $1.2 billion of loans linked to the acquisition of an artificial intelligence-driven software provider, as investors shy away from businesses perceived as vulnerable to competition from free AI tools.
content: A group of lenders led by Deutsche Bank AG is at risk of getting stuck with about $1.2 billion of loans linked to the acquisition of an artificial intelligence-driven software provider, as investors shy away from businesses perceived as vulnerable to... [484 chars]

title: Musk's Starlink updates privacy policy to allow consumer data to train AI
description: The policy includes new details stating that unless a user opts out, Starlink ‍data may be used “to train our machine learning or artificial intelligence models” and could be shared with the company’s service providers and “third-party collaborators,” without providing further details.
content: SpaceX revised its Starlink privacy policy to allow the use of customer data for AI training, a shift that could bolster Elon Musk's AI ambitions. Ahead of a blockbuster IPO planned ⁠for later this year, SpaceX is in talks to merge with Musk's AI com... [2331 chars]

title: B.C. says AI and data centre projects must compete for power
description: British Columbia’s government is launching a competitive selection process for artificial intelligence and data centre projects that would see companies fight over a set amount of power.
content:
British Columbia’s government is launching a competitive selection process for artificial intelligence and data centre projects that would see companies fight over a set amount of power.

title: US expanding coalition of Pax Silica partners, welcomes Qatar, UAE, anticipates India
description: WASHINGTON, Jan 30 : The United States is extending the list of countries that partner with it on Pax Silica, with Qatar and the UAE already welcomed in the agreement, and India to become an awaited member in February, US Under Secretary of State for Economic Affairs Jacob Helberg said on Thursday. Pax Silica is US-led coalition focused on economic security in the age of artificial intelligence (AI). The initiative views compute, silicon, minerals, and energy as shared strategic assets. […]
content: WASHINGTON, Jan 30 : The United States is extending the list of countries that partner with it on Pax Silica, with Qatar and the UAE already welcomed in the agreement, and India to become an awaited member in February, US Under Secretary of State for... [1059 chars]

title: Okta poll: AI adoption surges in APJ, but governance lags

content: Findings from Okta’s Oktane on the Road AI security poll, a live poll conducted across Australia, Singapore and Japan, highlight a growing gap between the deployment of AI systems and organisational readiness to manage the risks associated with them.... [5154 chars]

title: Tourists flock to small town to enjoy picturesque hot springs
description: A travel company accidentally sent tourists to a non-existent hot springs due to the use of artificial intelligence.
content:
It was a destination too good to be true.
An Australian travel company has admitted that its use of artificial intelligence accidentally caused tourists to trek to hot springs that didn’t exist

title: Former Google engineer convicted of stealing AI trade secrets in landmark U.S. espionage case
description: A federal jury in San Francisco has delivered a verdict that lands at the center of the global AI race, the Department of Justice announced Friday. On Thursday, jurors convicted a former Google software engineer of stealing sensitive AI trade secrets, marking the first U.S. conviction tied directly to artificial intelligence–related economic espionage. title: Online platforms offer filtering to fight AI slop
description: As "AI slop" floods the internet, efforts are mounting to stem an online deluge of shoddy images and videos made using increasingly advanced tech tools. Easily accessible generative artificial intelligence tools, such as Google's Veo and OpenAI's Sora, enable the creation of realistic imagery using just a few descriptive words.…

title: AI helps doctors spot breast cancer in scans: world-first trial
description: Artificial intelligence helps doctors spot more cases of breast cancer when reading routine scans, a world-first trial found Friday. The results suggest countries should roll out programs taking advantage of AI's scanning power to ease the workload of short-staffed radiologists, the Swedish lead researchers said. title: Reuters Science News Summary
description: A ‌Ukrainian official has posted pictures this week on social media of the wreckage of long-range Russian drones with Starlink terminals attached, and said Russia may have used Musk's system to guide drones that hit a Ukrainian passenger train on Tuesday. China plans space-based AI data centres, challenging Musk's SpaceX ambitions China plans to launch space-based artificial intelligence data centres over the next five ⁠years, state media reported on Thursday, a challenge to Elon Musk’s plan to deploy SpaceX data centres to the heavens.
content:
